name: Mutant Ninja Runner
description:
Run Jump GO! Escape the mighty wild cat. Enter a world of epic fantasy combat!

BECOME one of 4 legendary Mutant Tattoo Ninja!

UPGRADE equipment and unlock its full running strength! CONQUER foes! Run from epic bosses.

Jump slide and rocket away from epic beast with tattoo.

Enjoy the awesome adventure in Mutant Ninja Go - Hit Survival

Feature
-3D HD Graphics
-Cool Endearments
-Many Power Ups
-Mission
-More Games
-Ninja Tattoo

Gamebread "live to play"
